lead_paragraph: Mark Martin earned his 30th career Busch Series pole last night at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth, and Juan Pablo Montoya will start 10th in only his second Nascar race in today’s O’Reilly Challenge.
snippet: Mark Martin earned his 30th career Busch Series pole last night at Texas Motor Speedway in Fort Worth, and Juan Pablo Montoya will start 10th in only his second Nascar race in today’s O’Reilly Challenge.
